code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import'./darkmode.css';import Sun from'../../Img/sun.png';import Moon from'../../Img/moon.png';import{ThemeConext}from'../../context';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Darkmode(){var theme=useContext(ThemeConext);var handleCLick=function handleCLick(){theme.dispatch({type:"TOGGLE"});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Sun,alt:"",className:"d-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Moon,alt:"",className:"d-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-button",onClick:handleCLick,style:{left:theme.state.darkMode?0:25}})]})});}export default Darkmode;
